statements: SELECT * FROM PropertyMetrics
SELECT property_id, occupancy_rate, rental_yield FROM PropertyMetrics
SELECT vacancy_trend, occupancy_rate FROM PropertyMetrics WHERE rental_yield > 5
SELECT * FROM PropertyMetrics WHERE occupancy_rate < 80
SELECT property_id, rental_yield FROM PropertyMetrics ORDER BY rental_yield DESC
SELECT * FROM PropertyMetrics WHERE vacancy_trend = 'up'
SELECT property_id, occupancy_rate FROM PropertyMetrics ORDER BY occupancy_rate DESC
SELECT AVG(rental_yield) AS average_rental_yield FROM PropertyMetrics
SELECT * FROM PropertyMetrics WHERE occupancy_rate > 90 AND rental_yield < 5
SELECT property_id, vacancy_trend FROM PropertyMetrics WHERE property_id IN (SELECT property_id FROM PropertyMetrics WHERE occupancy_rate < 80)
SELECT * FROM property_performance_metrics
SELECT property_id, occupancy_rate FROM property_performance_metrics WHERE property_id = 1
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_type FROM property_details
SELECT * FROM property_performance_metrics ORDER BY rental_yield DESC
SELECT property_id, property_address FROM property_details WHERE property_type = 'Apartment'
SELECT property_id, occupancy_rate, rental_yield FROM property_performance_metrics WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_address FROM property_details WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT property_id, occupancy_rate, vacancy_trend, rental_yield FROM property_performance_metrics WHERE vacancy_trend > 3 ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_address, total_units FROM property_details WHERE total_units < 50 ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT property_id, property_type, total_units FROM property_details WHERE property_type LIKE '%House%' ORDER BY total_units DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_metrics;
SELECT property_id, occupancy_rate FROM property_metrics;
SELECT tenant_id, property_id, tenant_name FROM tenant_details WHERE lease_end_date > NOW();
SELECT property_id, rental_yield FROM property_metrics ORDER BY rental_yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM rent_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT property_id, occupancy_rate, rental_yield FROM property_metrics
SELECT tenant_id, tenant_name, lease_start_date, lease_end_date FROM tenant_details
SELECT payment_id, property_id, tenant_id, payment_date, amount FROM rent_payments
SELECT property_id, vacancy_trend FROM property_metrics
SELECT tenant_id, property_id, tenant_name, contact_number FROM tenant_details
SELECT * FROM property_occupancy_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT property_id, MONTH(timestamp) AS month, AVG(occupancy_rate) AS avg_occupancy_rate FROM property_occupancy_metrics GROUP BY property_id, month;
SELECT * FROM vacancy_trends WHERE vacancy_rate > 0.2 ORDER BY vacancy_rate DESC;
SELECT property_id, address, rental_type FROM property_details WHERE rental_type = 'Apartment' LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_id, MAX(yield_rate) AS max_yield_rate FROM rental_yields GROUP BY property_id ORDER BY max_yield_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_occupancy_metrics WHERE occupancy_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT property_id, vacancy_rate, month FROM vacancy_trends WHERE vacancy_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY vacancy_rate ASC, month DESC;
SELECT property_id, yield_rate, timestamp FROM rental_yields WHERE property_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT property_id, address, rental_type FROM property_details WHERE rental_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY property_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_id, AVG(occupancy_rate) AS avg_occupancy_rate FROM property_occupancy_metrics GROUP BY property_id HAVING AVG(occupancy_rate) > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_occupancy_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_performance_metrics;
SELECT property_name, occupancy_rate, rental_yield FROM property_performance_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM property_occupancy ORDER BY occupancy_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, vacancy_date, vacancy_reason FROM property_vacancy WHERE vacancy_reason LIKE '%maintenance%';
SELECT property_name, property_type, address, owner_name FROM property_details WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT * FROM property_performance_metrics LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_name, occupancy_rate, rental_yield FROM property_performance_metrics ORDER BY rental_yield DESC;
SELECT property_name, address FROM property_details WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT MAX(rent_amount), MIN(rent_amount) FROM rental_income;
SELECT property_name, occupancy_percentage FROM property_occupancy JOIN property_details ON property_occupancy.property_id = property_details.property_id;
